mapper.select: select c.id from coach c inner join tuser t on c.tuserId = t.id where t.phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber} and t.password = #{password}
select c.id from coach c inner join tuser t on c.tuserId = t.id where t.phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber} and t.status != #{status}

select o.id orgId, o.name orgName, oc.status from organization o inner join organization_coach oc on o.id = oc.organizationid where oc.coachName = (select c.name from coach c where c.id = #{coachId}) and oc.idType = (select t.idType from coach c inner join tuser t on c.tuserId = t.id where c.id = #{coachId}) and oc.idNumber = (select t.idNumber from coach c inner join tuser t on c.tuserId = t.id where c.id = #{coachId}) and oc.status not in (6, 7, 8)
mapper.insert: insert into coach(registerType, qqId, weixinId, weiboId, qqUsername, weixinUsername, weiboUsername, avatarUrl, graphicLock, createTime, lastAccessTime, type, tuserId) value (#{registerType}, #{qqId}, #{weixinId}, #{weiboId}, #{qqUsername}, #{weixinUsername}, #{weiboUsername}, #{avatarUrl}, #{graphicLock}, now(), now(), #{type}, #{tuserId})
mapper.update: update tuser t set t.password = #{password} where t.phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}

update coach c inner join tuser t on c.tuserId = t.id set t.name = #{name}, t.gender = #{gender}, t.email = #{email}, t.idType = #{idType}, t.idNumber = #{idNumber}, t.birthday = #{birthday}, c.areaCode = #{areaCode} where c.id = #{id}
update coach set lastAccessTime = now() where id = #{coachId}
update coach set avatarUrl = #{fileNameInQiniu} where id = #{coachId}
